title: "World-first study uses artificial intelligence to map the risks of ovarian cancer in women"
excerpt: "The University of South Australia will lead a world-first study, using artificial intelligence, to map the risks of the most fatal reproductive cancer in women worldwide so it can be detected and treated earlier."
